name: Rod
content:
"Rod" was the nickname of a clone trooper who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. At the Battle of Malastare, he served as the gunner for clone trooper pilot "Goji," who deployed an electro-proton bomb prototype that was instrumental in the Republic's ensuing victory.
Rod participated in the Battle of Malastare in 22 BBY where he served as the gunner of Goji's Y-wing. During the battle, he was able to shoot down a few vulture droids, while Goji dropped the electro-proton bomb that deactivated the droid army, allowing the Republic to win the battle but awakening the Zillo Beast.
Rod wore standard Phase I clone pilot armor. It was customized to display two red, winged creatures on either side of his helmet.
Rod's name is a reference to the Japanese monster Rodan. His armor also depicts Rodan.
